name: PageContent
description: Represents a region on a page that contains top-level content types such as Outline or Image. A PageContent object can be assigned an XY position.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the PageContent object.

properties.name: page
properties.description: Gets the page that contains the PageContent object.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Gets the type of the PageContent object.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Gets or sets the left (X-axis) position of the PageContent object.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Gets or sets the top (Y-axis) position of the PageContent object.

properties.name: image
properties.description: Gets the Image in the PageContent object. Returns null if PageContentType is not Image.

properties.name: outline
properties.description: Gets the Outline in the PageContent object. Returns null if PageContentType is not Outline.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
